title: It Had to Happen: Understanding Everything You Go Through in Life is for God's Purpose
description: It Had to Happen is an inspiring book that will heal wounds, restore your faith and dramatically change your relationship with God. After carefully retracing your steps, you will be able to identify with the direction you are heading and begin your journey with confidence and faith. During this process, you'll • The secrets needed to pursue your purpose • To enjoy the success of finding out who you really are And most importantly understand that past mistakes simply, HAD TO HAPPEN!
author: Cynthia A. Patterson
